load_image_czi¶

The load_image_czi module contains a single class, class LoadImageCZI(), which loads images of class class ImageAICS()

class LoadImageCZI()¶

class microscope_automation.load_image_czi.LoadImageCzi[source]¶
load_image(image, get_meta_data)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • image – ImageAICS object
  • get_meta_data – Flag if the user wants the meta data
Returns:

ImageAICS object with full pixel data and relevant meta data
